sub_title: Discover Trainee Commercial (B2C) at VodafoneZiggo | Young Professionals of the Year award 2023

school.name: University of Ljubljana, Faculty of Economics

awards.title: 1st place Innovative Allnighter: Heineken case
awards.description:
My team and I swiftly solved the challenge of Heineken / Pivovarna Laško Union in less than 24 hours that were given to us. 

We conducted primary research with Generation Z and Y with more than 35 in-depth interviews, analysed secondary data, conducted market research and analysed Heineken's current communication, in order to provide viable and innovative solutions for Heineken to efficiently address mentioned generations. 

We provided a clear explanation about the differences between the generations' challenges and provided solutions to solve them. Based on findings of Heineken's current communication, we provided feedback with practical recommendations and actionable guidelines.

Our solutions won first place.

awards.title: 1st place Danfoss Trata's Virtual Hackathon
awards.description:
Danfoss Trata proposed an HR challenge with a goal of attracting more job seekers from Generation Z in the region.

My team and I conducted in-depth interviews with international students and young professionals in the markets that the comapny wished to address. We incorporated the insights into our event planning and communication strategy. 

In less than 48 hours we developed a detailed plan for a regional contest, found necessary suppliers and proposed a communication plan for the event. 

The solution won first place.

awards.title: 2nd place Innovative All-nighter 2019: Hisense case
awards.description:
My team and I developed a launch plan for the brand Hisense. 

We focused on in-store promotions, launch event, influencer strategy and provided a communication plan based on relevant event for Hisense TVs. 

Our solution won 2nd place.

awards.title: 3rd place Copywriting at Freešn competition 2019
awards.description:
After a copywriting training from Peter Zabret, I decided to take on a challenge of developing a creative marketing concept for a FMCG juice brand Sola.

I developed a communication plan for the launch of new product. I presented a slogan, visual identity and a timeline of marketing activities including innovative OOH promotion, suggestions for long-term ambassadors,  influencer marketing campaign and guidelines for social media communication according to the brief. 

I won 3rd place.

awards.title: 2nd place Mercator Marketing Challenge
awards.description: During student marketing conference Fanfara 2018 we were presented with Mercator's Marketing Challenge. Together with my team, I have worked on creating an effective marketing strategy for a promotional event using a broad variety of communication channels. Since Mercator is a retailer, we've also created an in-store branding strategy and a plan for sales promotion during the event. Our solutions and ideas earned us a 2nd place in competition.

awards.title: 1st place Slovenian Case Challenge
awards.description: Working on Hofer's case, me and my team were dealing with differentiation, positioning and communication of the Hofer brand. Our solution consisted of a thorough analysis, on which we based our recommendations, selection of the right communication channels and improving customer experience while still considering values and wanted representation of the brand. We were awarded 1st place.

awards.title: 3rd place Slovenian Case Challenge
awards.description: Me and my team were working on Mercator's case, developing a grocery store that insures the best customer experience possible and is tailored according to customer's needs. Our solution was based on precise market research and consumer behaviour analysis. We were awarded 3rd place.

awards.title: 2nd place Lidl Hackathon
awards.description: Me and my team worked on connecting Lidl and their customers. Our idea was based upon shared economy models and Lidl's contribution to society. Considering Lidl's brand and business model we found a solution that placed 2nd on the competition.

organizations.name: Student Section of The Slovenian Marketing Association - ŠSDMS

projects.title: 13th Fanfara / Fanfara Live
projects.description:
As Head of Communications for the biggest student marketing conference in Slovenia, I was responsible for attracting more than 300 attendees to the event, setting the communication plan and marketing strategy of the event, leading my team and smooth coordination with other teams. I was also responsible for the financial success of the event, since it was partially dependant on the sales.

In March, we were faced with a tough situation of having to postpone Fanfara due to COVID-19 and transform it online. We successfully adapted marketing activities, redesigned the visuals and helped other teams with the transition.

We surpassed the initial goal and attracted more than 370 attendees and 12 excellent speakers, ending the event with excellent reviews.

contributors.headline: Discover Trainee Commercial (B2C) at VodafoneZiggo | Young Professionals of the Year award 2023

projects.title: 25th anniversary of ŠSDMS (Student section SMA)
projects.description: As a part of the organisation team, I was responsible for co-creating the creative concept, provide ideas for the programme and speakers and execution of planned activities. The anniversary was a first of its kind and gathered a high percentage of Alumni members consisting of marketing professionals and therefore considered as very successful.

contributors.headline: Discover Trainee Commercial (B2C) at VodafoneZiggo | Young Professionals of the Year award 2023
Discover Trainee Commercial (B2C) at VodafoneZiggo | Young Professionals of the Year award 2023

projects.title: TEDxUniversityOfLjubljanaSalon@EF
projects.description: TEDx was created in the spirit of TED's mission, "ideas worth spreading." It supports independent organizers who want to create a TED-like event in their own community. Together with other ambitious students from Faculty of Economics, University of Ljubljana, we decided to organise such event on our faculty. While still sticking to TED license rules, we have created a unique event for people seeking great ideas. I was responsible for communication with speakers, event planning, acquiring sponsors and coordinating on-site logistics.

contributors.headline: Discover Trainee Commercial (B2C) at VodafoneZiggo | Young Professionals of the Year award 2023

projects.title: Business Hive 2018
projects.description: Business Hive 2018 was the biggest crowdsourcing competition in Slovenia. This unique competitive business weekend connected 5 successful Slovenian companies with more than 150 ambitious students from various fields of study. As one of Head Organisers, I was in charge of marketing. With setting a successful marketing strategy and building an outstanding public image I contributed to the increase of number of participants for more than 100% in comparison to last year's Business Hive.

SMB Account Manager at Httpool - Meta Authorized Sales Partner
Marketing Communication Manager @ re:do | Brand Building, Marketing Strategy

projects.title: International Week Slovenia 2017
projects.description:
International Week Coordinating Organization is an international organization. Its members are voluntary committed students from around the world. Its purpose is to create and support international exchange between students of prestigious universities from all over the world.

Each participating university organizes its own International Week under IWCO.  International Week Slovenia 2017 was full of activities that helped participants dive into Slovenian culture and explore the business environment. As a part of organizing team I have been responsible for public image of the event and creating a fun, yet professional event programme that enabled participants an unforgettable and educative experience.

contributors.headline: Discover Trainee Commercial (B2C) at VodafoneZiggo | Young Professionals of the Year award 2023

projects.title: Business Hive 2017
projects.description:
Business Hive is an international crowdsourcing competition, taking place annually at Faculty of Economics, University of Ljubljana. This unique business weekend connected more than 60 Slovenian and international students with 3 successful companies;Telekom Slovenije, AMZS and Danfoss Trata. 

I was a part of a Marketing team and was responsible for creating a marketing strategy and managing social media. I also planned a corporate graphic image of the event.

profile_positions.description:
As a part of VodafoneZiggo's young talent programme,

- I joined the 5G Hub  & B2B services teams in Technology to

▪️reposition the 5G Hub to match business objectives
▪️learn about Innovation Strategy 
▪️improve processes and increase efficiency through LEAN methods

- contributed to increasing digitization with my first project in Center of Excellence for Digital Platforms in Commercial (B2C) by:

▪️developing a framework to assess digitization 
▪️defining Objectives & Key Results (OKRs) of Digital Strategy
▪️managing stakeholders & being responsible for alignment of several departments 
▪️building recommendations & business cases based on my analysis and market research
profile_positions.title: Discover Trainee Commercial (B2C)

profile_positions.description: Researching the effect of brand activism on brands, helping with the literature study, identifying best practices of brand activism, discovering and summarising recent case studies, exploring brand management and its impact on businesses and consumers and combining that with my Master's thesis under the supervision of prof. dr. ir. Peeter Verlegh
profile_positions.title: Brand Activism Research Assistant

▪️ more than doubled the attendance and profit of the event making it the most visited event of the association

▪️ represented the association externally

Amsterdam Commercial Night (ACN) is one of the biggest events of the MAA. It is aimed at anyone who is enthusiastic about marketing or advertisement. Speakers of inspiring companies will give their view about their advertising campaigns and high-profile commercials. Every year the event is attended by students, alumni and creative marketing professionals in Amsterdam.
profile_positions.title: Chairwoman of Amsterdam Commercial Night

profile_positions.description:
▪️created, managed and edited content for McDonald's Slovenia, Spar Slovenia, Bud (Budweiser) Slovenia and more
▪️co-created digital and integrated communications strategies
▪️provided creative solutions and ideas for digital campaigns
▪️wrote copies for digital channels
▪️wrote short scripts and plans for photoshoots

Futura DDB is the most awarded agency in Slovenia, also declared agency of the year and agency of the past 3 decades by Slovenian Advertising Chamber. It focuses on integrated solutions that increase efficiency and challenges the future with digital transformation programs as well as creativity.
profile_positions.title: Content Creator

company.name: Student Section of the Slovenian Marketing Association (ŠSDMS)

profile_positions.company: Student Section of the Slovenian Marketing Association (ŠSDMS)
profile_positions.description:
Student Section of the Slovenian Marketing Association is a section of the biggest marketing community in Slovenia counting more than 130 members. 

As the president I was responsible for: 

▪️leading the Management Board
▪️coordination of teams
▪️preparing and presenting the yearly plan of events and projects
▪️acquiring new partnerships with companies and other organisations
▪️mentoring of juinor colleagues

During our mandate, we successfully reorganised work processes, organised 18 online and offline events ranging from webinars, workshops, round tables to the biggest student marketing conference in Slovenia, Fanfara. The Management Board was also responsible for connecting young talent to companies, providing mentorship and guidance to members, active communication with members and coordintaing activities with Slovenian Marketing Association.
profile_positions.title: President

profile_positions.description:
After my internship, I took on a role of a Social Media Manager and focused on 

▪️building strong communities on Instagram,
▪️creating effective social media strategies and 
▪️developing creative concepts for digital campaigns.

I also wrote copies for
🔸 Facebook ads
🔸 Google ads 
🔸 websites and landing pages and
🔸 blogs.

References: Mass shoes, mBills, Iglusport, Lisca lingerie, Regional Development Agency for Koroška, Smile concept store
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description: During my internship at Optiweb I have been given an opportunity to work with digital marketing experts on digital projects that challenged my knowledge of marketing, help me grow and improve my skills while creating digital marketing campaigns, social media copywriting and creating communication strategies.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern

company.name: Združenje Manager - Managers'​ Association of Slovenia

profile_positions.description: As a programme coordinator I was responsible for smooth and active communication between mentors and managers, who participate in this unique mentoring experience. During the programme I also learned from accomplished managers from Slovenia's most successful companies and gained skills such as business communication and time management.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator of Mentorship Programme

profile_positions.description: Vision Plus is a digital marketing agency working closely with their clients. As a Junior Marketing Manager I created digital marketing campaigns. Connecting different channels and media, I mostly focused on Facebook, SEO and Google Adwords. Besides trying to overcome Facebook and Instagram algorithms I also created content as a copywriter  for blogs, ads, websites and everyday posts on social media.
profile_positions.title: Junior Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: As Head of PR & External Marketing Department I was responsible for planning a complete marketing strategy, taking care of Management Group's public image and managing all communication channels as well as maintaing good business relations with strategic partners. Leading a group of 9, I learned how to motivate a team, mindfully delegate tasks and adapt to external pressure. I also developed strong communication and leadership skills.
profile_positions.title: Head of PR & External Marketing
